description: Source code for FastAPI router managing test scripts, including endpoints for create, read, update, delete, and list operations on test scripts.

classes.name: TestScriptIn
classes.description: Pydantic model for input when creating or updating a test script.

classes.name: TestScriptOut
classes.description: Pydantic model for output representation of a test script, including configuration to load from ORM attributes.

methods.name: create_test_script( payload: TestScriptIn, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester")), )
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new test script; checks for duplicate names, saves to database, and returns the result.

methods.name: list_test_scripts( page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester", "viewer")), )
methods.description: Endpoint to list all test scripts with pagination, returning total count and items.

methods.name: get_test_script( test_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester", "viewer")), )
methods.description: Retrieve details of a specific test script by ID, raises 404 if not found.

methods.name: update_test_script( test_id: int, payload: TestScriptIn, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester")), )
methods.description: Update existing test script data; raises 404 if the specified script does not exist.

methods.name: delete_test_script( test_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin")), )
methods.description: Delete a test script by ID; raises 404 if not found.

ctags.name: create_test_script
ctags.signature: ( payload: TestScriptIn, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester")), )

ctags.name: delete_test_script
ctags.signature: ( test_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin")), )

ctags.name: get_test_script
ctags.signature: ( test_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester", "viewer")), )

ctags.name: list_test_scripts
ctags.signature: ( page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester", "viewer")), )

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^    name: str = Field(..., description="Test script name")$/

ctags.name: update_test_script
ctags.signature: ( test_id: int, payload: TestScriptIn, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester")), )
